item.title: A substantial portion of US healthcare workers are 55 years of age or older
item.description: Buerhaus PI, Auerbach DI, Staiger DO. Older Clinicians and the Surge in Novel Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19). JAMA. Published online March 30, 2020. doi:10.1001/jama.2020.4978
